item.title: 修改常用端口
item.description: 修改 ssh 22 端口 vi /etc/ssh/sshd_config Port xxxx sysemctl restart sshd 修改 git 对应端口 vi /.git/config url = ssh://git@server:xxxx/root/test.git rsync 指定端口 rsync -e 'ssh -p xxxx' ssh 指定端口 ssh -p xxxx root@server "systemctl restart heepark" 修改 MySQL 3306 端口 vi /etc/my.cnf.d/server.cnf [mysqld] port=xxxx systemctl restart mariadb

item.title: MySQL 设置默认编码为 utf8mb4
item.description: mariadb 修改配置文件 vim /etc/my.conf.d/server.conf [mysqld] character_set_server=utf8mb4 collation-server=utf8mb4_general_ci init_connect='SET NAMES utf8mb4' skip-character-set-client-handshake=true 重启 mariadb systemctl restart mariadb 查看编码 SHOW VARIABLES WHERE Variable_name LIKE 'character\_set\_%' OR Variable_name LIKE 'collation%'; mysql 修改配置文件 vim /etc/my.cnf [client] default-character-set = utf8mb4 [mysql] default-character-set = utf8mb4 [mysqld] character_set_server=utf8mb4 collation-server=utf8mb4_general_ci init_connect='SET NAMES utf8mb4' skip-character-set-client-handshake=true 重启 mariadb systemctl restart mysqld 查看编码 SHOW VARIABLES WHERE Variable_name LIKE 'character\_set\_%' OR Variable_name LIKE 'collation%';
